profile.name: Achmad Fathullah
profile.title: Apple Developer Academy Graduate Cohort 4 | Mobile Engineer | Problem Solver | Enhancing Mobile Performance & User Experience @Qiscus
profile.bio: Mobile Engineer with 5+ years of experience building intuitive and high-performance mobile applications across iOS (Swift/SwiftUI), Android (Kotlin/Java), Flutter, and React Native platforms. Apple Developer Academy Graduate (Cohort 4) with proven expertise in delivering seamless user experiences and optimizing app performance. Experienced in collaborating with cross-functional teams, implementing modern architectures (MVVM, Clean Architecture), and maintaining production applications. Passionate about staying current with mobile development trends and best practices while delivering quality solutions that serve real users.

skills.name: TODO: UI Automator & Appium
skills.note: Need to learn for automated testing

experience.title: Mobile Engineer (iOS, Android, Flutter and RN)
experience.description:
Mobile Application Development & Support - Design, develop, and maintain mobile applications across Flutter, Android (Kotlin/Java), iOS (Swift), and React Native platforms for Qiscus customer engagement platform. Debug and resolve technical issues ensuring app stability and performance.

Performance Optimization - Monitor and optimize app performance using profiling tools (Android Studio Profiler, Xcode Instruments, Firebase Performance). Implement performance improvements including lazy loading, efficient caching, and memory optimization.

Testing & Quality Assurance - Write and maintain unit tests using JUnit and Mockito. Conduct code reviews and ensure code quality standards. Contribute to improving test coverage and reliability.

Incident Management - Work with support team to investigate and resolve customer-reported issues. Participate in on-call rotation for production support. Use Firebase Crashlytics for crash monitoring and resolution.

Cross-functional Collaboration - Communicate with backend engineers, product managers, and designers in Agile/SCRUM environment. Participate in sprint planning, daily standups, and retrospectives.

Automation & CI/CD - Develop automation scripts and tools to improve development efficiency. Work with CI/CD pipelines for automated builds and deployments.

TODO: Add quantifiable metrics (e.g., crash rate reduction %, performance improvements, number of features delivered)
TODO: Highlight specific architectural patterns implemented (MVVM, Clean Architecture)
TODO: Mention mentoring activities if applicable

experience.title: Android Developer
experience.description:
Android Application Development - Collaborated with cross-functional team to design, develop, and deliver features for Qiscus Android applications using Kotlin and Java. Implemented MVVM architecture with Android Architecture Components (ViewModel, LiveData, Room).

UI Development - Built responsive user interfaces following Material Design principles. Optimized RecyclerView performance with ViewHolder pattern and DiffUtil for smooth scrolling.

API Integration - Integrated RESTful APIs using Retrofit and OkHttp. Implemented efficient data caching and offline support strategies.

Testing - Wrote unit tests using JUnit and Mockito to ensure code robustness. Tested edge cases, usability scenarios, and general reliability. Participated in code reviews.

Performance & Bug Fixing - Profiled app performance using Android Studio Profiler. Identified and fixed memory leaks using LeakCanary. Actively debugged and resolved production issues.

Continuous Learning - Evaluated and implemented new Android technologies and libraries to improve development efficiency and app quality.

TODO: Add specific features built (e.g., real-time chat, file sharing, push notifications)

experience.title: iOS Developer
experience.description:
iOS Development Training - Completed intensive 10-month program at Apple Developer Academy focusing on iOS app development using Swift and SwiftUI. Built multiple iOS applications from concept to completion.

iOS Technologies - Developed apps using Swift, SwiftUI, and UIKit. Implemented MVVM architectural pattern for clean code organization. Worked with Core Data for persistence, Combine for reactive programming, and URLSession for networking.

Agile Methodology - Applied Challenge Based Learning (CBL) to solve real-world problems. Worked in SCRUM teams with sprint planning, daily standups, and retrospectives. Collaborated with designers and fellow developers.

UI/UX Implementation - Created responsive user interfaces with SwiftUI and Auto Layout. Followed Human Interface Guidelines for iOS design best practices.

experience.title: Android Developer
experience.description:
Android Development - Developed and maintained Android applications for various client projects using Java and Kotlin. Worked in fast-paced agency environment delivering solutions across different industries.

Application Development - Built Android apps from requirements to deployment. Implemented features including user authentication, data persistence with SQLite, and third-party library integrations.

API Integration - Connected Android applications with backend services through RESTful APIs. Implemented JSON parsing and proper error handling for network calls.

Bug Fixing & Maintenance - Debugged and resolved issues in existing mobile applications. Analyzed crash reports and implemented fixes to improve app stability.

Project Delivery - Worked on multiple client projects simultaneously. Met project deadlines and delivered quality code following client requirements.

experience.title: Contract Software Engineer
experience.description:
Full-Stack Development - Worked on mobile banking application development covering backend APIs, Android mobile app, and database layers. Collaborated with team to deliver banking features meeting security and compliance standards.

Backend Development - Built and maintained RESTful APIs using Laravel Lumen and Zend Framework. Implemented secure authentication and authorization for banking transactions.

Android Development - Developed mobile banking application using Java with native Android development. Implemented features for account management, transactions, and secure data handling.

Database Management - Designed and maintained database schemas using MySQL and PostgreSQL. Wrote optimized queries for transaction processing and data retrieval.

Solution Architecture - Translated business requirements into technical solutions. Created technical documentation for APIs and system architecture.

Quality & Compliance - Ensured code quality through reviews and testing. Maintained compliance with banking security standards and regulations.

experience.title: Full-stack Software Developer
experience.description:
Has finished on several system projects, namely scholarship information systems and reminder information systems (management system for foreign students who will continue their studies at the university or who will take time off, manage their personal data then give warnings / reminders to e-mails of foreign students when there is important information that must be immediately followed up).

Projects:
1. Scholarship information systems (http://kemahasiswaan.uin-malang.ac.id/beasiswa)
2. Reminder Information systems (http://isa.uin-malang.ac.id/reminder/)
3. PDAM Giri Tirta Gresik Apps

projects.title: Ceklok Mobile Apps
projects.description: CEKLOK merupakan platform HRIS yang ikut berkembang dengan perusahaan. Features: Authentication with AI face Recognition, Absence & Leave, Overtime, etc

projects.title: Commjunction Mobile Apps
projects.description: COMMJUNCTION memberikan platform komunitas yang dapat dipersonalisasikan dengan kebutuhan sebuah komunitas untuk mencapai tujuan bersama

projects.title: Bank Mandiri Taspen Backoffice
projects.description: Web app page for Mobile Banking to record and manage all transaction on Mobile Banking Mandiri Taspen. Backoffice merupakan aplikasi berbasis web yang berfungsi untuk mencatat aktifitas yang dilakukan mobile banking, pengelola user mobile banking (Lupa password, Pendaftaran User baru, Block user, etc), Pencatat log error dan transaksi, Pembukaan deposito special rate dan lain lain.

projects.title: Sistem Informasi Beasiswa UIN Malang

projects.description: Reminder information systems (management system for foreign students who will continue their studies at the university or who will take time off, manage their personal data then give warnings / reminders to e-mails of foreign students when there is important information that must be immediately followed up)

projects.title: Popular Movies App
projects.description: This is my version of Udacity's Popular Movie project. In this project implementing The Movie DB API of popular movies, top rated movies, movie's trailers and reviews. It also has endless scroll on movies list. It is also implementing Model View Presenter (MVP) architecture. I build this as part of Udacity Associate Android Developer Fast Track program.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio & Career Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive career management system built as a single-page application. Features an interactive portfolio showcase and career dashboard with 11 modules including CV Manager, Job Tracker for top tech companies (Grab, Tokopedia, Gojek), Skill Development tracking, Learning Hub, Timeline visualization, and mobile responsive design. Helps track progress toward senior mobile engineer positions.

projects.title: Instagram Showcase Portfolio
projects.description: An Instagram-inspired portfolio template designed specifically for mobile developers to showcase their app projects in a familiar, engaging interface. Features responsive grid layout, interactive hover effects, profile section with stats, and modern UI perfect for displaying app screenshots.

projects.title: KepoIn - Personal Care Tracking App
projects.description: A comprehensive personal care management app that helps users maintain health routines, track medications, skincare regimens, and other personal care tasks. Built with clean architecture featuring category-based organization, smart reminders, progress monitoring, growth tracker, warranty tracker, and mileage tracker. Uses category-first approach where each category functions as a mini-app.

projects.title: EcoMart Mobile - E-Commerce App
projects.description: Full-featured e-commerce mobile app with product browsing, shopping cart, checkout, and order tracking. Implements real-time updates, push notifications, and offline support. Features include user authentication, product search, wishlist, order history, and Firebase analytics.

projects.title: Dealaja - Deal Platform Mobile
projects.description: Mobile app for discovering and purchasing deals with real-time updates. Features include deal browsing, search functionality, user authentication, push notifications via OneSignal, real-time chat support with Socket.io, video content, and social sharing capabilities.

projects.title: Qiscus Chat SDK - Android
projects.description: Enterprise-grade chat SDK providing real-time messaging capabilities for Android applications. Core SDK implementation with features including real-time messaging, file sharing, typing indicators, read receipts, and offline message queue.

projects.title: Qiscus Chat SDK - iOS
projects.description: iOS implementation of Qiscus chat platform providing seamless real-time messaging for iOS applications. Features include message synchronization, media handling, push notifications, and offline support.

projects.title: Qiscus Chat SDK - Flutter
projects.description: Flutter implementation of Qiscus chat platform enabling cross-platform real-time messaging. Provides unified API for both iOS and Android with native performance and platform-specific optimizations.

projects.title: Qiscus Multichannel Widget - Android
projects.description: Customer support widget enabling multi-channel communication for Android apps. Supports live chat, ticket management, agent assignment, and customer satisfaction ratings. Easy integration with existing Android applications.

projects.title: Qiscus Multichannel Widget - iOS
projects.description: iOS customer support widget for multi-channel communication. Provides seamless integration with iOS apps for customer service, live chat, and support ticket management.

projects.title: GithubUser - Android Learning Project
projects.description: Educational project exploring GitHub API integration and modern Android architecture. Features user search, profile viewing, repository listing, and favorites management. Demonstrates MVVM pattern, Room database, and Retrofit implementation.

projects.title: MovieLover - Movie Database App
projects.description: Movie browsing app demonstrating clean architecture principles. Features movie discovery, detailed information, trailers, reviews, and favorites management. Implements TMDB API integration with offline caching.

projects.title: SIBU - Apple Developer Academy Project
projects.description: Personal project developed at Apple Developer Academy using SwiftUI. Demonstrates modern iOS development practices and Challenge Based Learning methodology.

projects.title: Garuda Indonesia - Android App
projects.description: Aviation industry mobile solution for Garuda Indonesia. Enterprise application for flight booking, check-in, and passenger services.

projects.title: Garuda Indonesia - iOS App
projects.description: iOS version of Garuda Indonesia's mobile solution providing flight booking, check-in, and passenger management features.

projects.title: Flutter BLoC Clean Architecture
projects.description: Learning project demonstrating BLoC pattern with clean architecture in Flutter. Shows separation of concerns, dependency injection, and testable code structure.

projects.title: Flutter TDD E-Commerce App
projects.description: Test-driven development approach to building e-commerce apps in Flutter. Demonstrates comprehensive testing strategy including unit tests, widget tests, and integration tests with clean architecture.

projects.title: Flutter Riverpod Clean Architecture
projects.description: Modern state management with Riverpod demonstrating clean architecture principles. Shows how to use Riverpod for dependency injection and state management in a scalable Flutter app.

projects.title: Flutter GoRouter Example
projects.description: Advanced navigation patterns with GoRouter in Flutter. Demonstrates declarative routing, deep linking, route guards, and nested navigation.

projects.title: BTPN Multichannel React Native
projects.description: Banking applications for BTPN with multichannel support. Provides secure banking features including account management, transfers, and customer support integration.

projects.title: Jitsi Meet Integration
projects.description: Video conferencing integration using Jitsi Meet SDK for React Native. Provides real-time video calling, screen sharing, and chat features.

projects.title: Qiscus Meet IT - Video Meeting Platform
projects.description: Video conferencing and meeting platform built with cross-platform technologies. Supports real-time video calls, screen sharing, and meeting management.

projects.title: AHM Honda - Automotive App
projects.description: Automotive industry application for Honda dealerships and customers. Features include vehicle information, service booking, and customer management.

projects.title: MyBB POC - Banking Proof of Concept
projects.description: Banking sector POC demonstrating secure mobile banking features including authentication, transactions, and account management with security best practices.

projects.title: Dicoding Android Expert Project
projects.description: Advanced Android development certification project demonstrating clean architecture, modularization, dependency injection, and comprehensive testing strategies.

projects.title: Dicoding iOS Expert Project
projects.description: iOS expert certification project demonstrating advanced iOS development with clean architecture, Combine framework, and comprehensive testing.

projects.title: Dunia Games Call - Gaming Platform
projects.description: Real-time voice/video calling feature for gaming platform using WebRTC. Enables gamers to communicate during gameplay with low latency.

projects.title: Mekari Chat Android
projects.description: Custom chat implementation for Mekari's enterprise platform. Provides secure business communication with file sharing, group chat, and admin controls.

projects.title: Everpro Chat - Flutter
projects.description: Professional chat application for enterprise use built with Flutter. Features include team messaging, file sharing, and integration with business tools.

projects.title: Dealaja Flutter - Deal Platform
projects.description: E-commerce platform for deals and discounts built with Flutter. Cross-platform app with BLoC pattern for state management.

projects.title: Quadrant POI Allocator
projects.description: POI (Point of Interest) management application using MapKit. Helps users manage and allocate points of interest with location-based features.

projects.title: TezzBuzz - Social Communication App
projects.description: Social and communication application for iOS with modern UI and real-time features.

projects.title: Wedding Invitation Sites
projects.description: Collection of beautiful wedding invitation websites including our-love-story (interactive timeline), wedding-invite (elegant template), weddingfathulririn (custom site), and felaundangan (invitation platform). Features responsive design, photo galleries, and RSVP management.

projects.title: Qiscus Chat SDK - JavaScript
projects.description: Sample implementation of Qiscus chat SDK for web applications. Demonstrates real-time messaging integration for web platforms.

projects.title: Vanilla JavaScript Examples
projects.description: Collection of vanilla JavaScript examples and patterns demonstrating core JavaScript concepts without frameworks. Educational resource for learning JavaScript fundamentals.

projects.title: Bank Raya Sample Integration
projects.description: Banking API integration sample for Flutter demonstrating secure banking operations and API communication.

projects.title: Rewigo Apps - Localization Demo
projects.description: Flutter app demonstrating internationalization and localization implementation. Shows how to support multiple languages and regions.

projects.title: Flutter Games Collection
projects.description: Game development with Flutter using Flame engine. Collection of game examples demonstrating game loops, sprites, and physics.

testimonials.name: Muharam Adi Nugraha
testimonials.message:
I'm working with Mr. Achmad Fathulah his Manager trough Mr. Yunizar as his team leader with daily basis communication as a System Analyst & UI/UX Designer. Mr. Achmad Fathulah shows a great talent on development for Android Development with such punctuality, given the problems and opportunities, he had shown his great potential by dealing with such complicated matters in short time, showing a steady increase of Performance mades him a great talent with great personality so to speak.

He had shown her great talent as Mobile Development Engineer especially on Android Mobile Development, It is such an honor to be working with Mr. Achmad and I hope the best for his future and what comes next on his career.
